short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful web highlighter that lets you mark, annotate, and organize content across the web for better learning and research.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features

üéØ Smart Highlighting
- Click and drag to highlight any text on web pages
- Multiple highlight colors for different purposes
- Highlights persist across sessions

üìù Quick Notes
- Add notes to any highlight
- Review and edit your annotations anytime
- Organize your thoughts while reading

üîç Easy Management
- View all highlights on current page
- Delete or modify existing highlights
- Seamless synchronization across devices

 How to Use

1. Installation
   - Install Markify from Chrome Web Store
   - Click the Markify icon to activate

2. Highlighting
   - Select any text on a webpage
   - Choose a color for your highlight
   - Click to add optional notes

3. Managing Highlights
   - Click the Markify icon to see all highlights
   - Review your notes and annotations
   - Easily delete or modify existing highlights

Perfect for:
- Students doing research
- Professionals reading documentation
- Anyone who loves to organize web content
